EUI - Release Notes

Version 1.5 (25.03.10)
  Support for programs with non-active proctypes and run.
  Blanks are no longer terminators in strings for excluded variables and statements.

Version 1.4 (18.03.10)
  Distribution includes Erigone 2.1.5.

Version 1.3 (04.03.10)
  Fixed problem with forking "dot".
  Independence from Erigone distribution: examples and user's guide included.
  Quick start guide added.
  Cleanup of unused declarations in Config.java.
  Add message concerning counterexample.
  Display of Buchi automaton before a verification is now a configuration option.
  Add error message if Erigone arguments are invalid.

Version 1.2.1 (12.11.09)
  Arguments for Erigone were changed.

Version 1.2 (20.09.09)
  Generate state space diagram.

Version 1.1 (05.09.09)
  Version compatible with Erigone version 2.

Version 1.0 (10.07.09)
  Initial release.
